songs.title: Intro*
songs.lyrics:
{Verse 1]
Here I stand on the wall
The blood is on my hands, the blood is on my hands
Here you stand on the wall
The blood is on your hands, the blood is on your hands

[Pre-Chorus]
Take me from this place
I'm wide awake, I'm wide awake

[Chorus]
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa
Whoa...
